sentence.Network_en: I was living in cloud-cuckoo-land about my salary expectations.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对自己的薪水充满了不切实际的幻想。

sentence.Network_en: Children admire the fairies in that tale living in cloud cuckoo land.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们很羡慕故事中生活在仙境里的仙女们.

sentence.Network_en: The minister is living in cloud - cuckoo - land if he thinks this problem can be solved overnight.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果部长以为这个问题能在一夜之间得到解决,那他简直是生活在梦幻之境中.

Cloud computing , or cloud - cuckoo land ?, 云计算 ? 云中天国?

entry.def: If you say that someone is living in cloud-cuckoo-land, you are criticizing them because they think there are no problems and that things will happen exactly as they want them to, when this is obviously not the case.

example.ex: I was living in cloud-cuckoo-land about my salary expectations.
example.tran: 我对自己的薪水充满了不切实际的幻想。

means.word_mean: 1. an imaginary place where you say people are when they seem optimistically out of touch with reality
